biotools.summary: It is a web application that allows for the fast and flexible online analysis of small-RNA-seq data. It was designed for the end user in the lab, providing an easy-to-use web frontend including video tutorials, demo data, and best practice step-by-step guidelines on how to analyze sRNA-seq data. Oasis generates downloadable interactive web reports for easy visualization, exploration, and analysis of data on a local system.
